description: Try our easy to follow Light Moussaka recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Light Moussaka Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g lamb sausages with mint & rosemary

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk ricotta and eggs together in a bowl. Add cheeses, salt and pepper. Stir until combined. Spoon mixture over vegetable topping. Place onto a baking tray. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden. Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve immediately.
